title: Pixel5- voice to text user comma and as you can see dash my punctuation is now spelled out period
content: I've tried to use voice to text as I always have period my phone is updated as is my messages app and my browsers period and instead of using punctuation now it spells out by punctuation question mark very inconvenient for someone who uses it for accessibility functionality comma as you can imagine period
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
